hero.descMain: Transform images into actionable text with our AI-powered tools.
hero.descSub: Fast, accurate, and incredibly easy to use

full.title: Full Page OCR
full.description: Choose between CopyFish speed or Google Vision accuracy before you upload.

title.title: Title & Link Extractor
title.description: Pick the engine that best matches your SERP screenshots and jump straight into extraction.

fullCopyfish.label: Full Page · CopyFish
fullCopyfish.summary: Use OCR.Space / CopyFish for fast, generous 10MB batches.

fullVision.label: Full Page · Google Vision
fullVision.summary: Route scans to DOCUMENT_TEXT_DETECTION for column-heavy layouts.

titleCopyfish.label: Title Extractor · CopyFish
titleCopyfish.summary: Great for quick SERP screenshots with Latin characters.

titleVision.label: Title Extractor · Google Vision
titleVision.summary: Use TEXT_DETECTION when CopyFish misses dense, multilingual SERPs.

videoVision.title: Video Frame OCR
videoVision.description: Upload short videos and extract every on-screen word by sampling frames with Google Vision.

redbox.title: Red Box Detector
redbox.description: Advanced computer vision that detects and extracts text from red bounding boxes with precision.

footer.tagline: Image Processing Suite • Powered by Advanced AI Technology • v2.3.7
